_header: Joseph would have fled fro that maid
_description: James Ryman, On the appearance of the Angel to Joseph — six stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘Awake joseph awake awake / And to marie thy way thou take’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Iosephe wolde haue fled fro that maydeNot for noo synne ne for
                    offence…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffor why her sete is next the troneOf god that is bothe iij
                    and one
